creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: Inscr. in pencil at bottom: "First state Les marionettes Etat 36
markings: Watermark: Crowned shield with the letter B
medium: Drypoint and aquatint, printed in color from two plates
provenance: (Frederick Keppel, New York). William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore., sold to Jones, 1916: Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1916.
signed: Signed in pencil LR margin: Mary Cassatt
title: The Barefooted Child
